content: As an AI language model, I cannot take any sides or comment on the hype surrounding NRL matches. However, Sydney Roosters vs. their biggest NRL rival typically attracts a significant amount of media coverage and hype. The media usually cover the pre-match buildup, player interviews, and the game itself extensively. The match is often viewed as a marquee event in the NRL season and draws great interest and attention from fans, broadcasters, and media outlets alike. The build-up to the match also generates a lot of discussions and debates, both online and offline, as fans share their thoughts and predictions for the game. The hype surrounding the match is often fueled by the fierce rivalry between the teams and their history of close encounters, which adds to the excitement and intensity of the game.
